message_1: If a message "HELLO WORLD" is encrypted using Rail Fence Cipher with a 3-level fence, what will be the encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using a Rail Fence Cipher with a 3-level fence, we arrange the letters in a zigzag pattern with 3 rows:

H . . . O . . . R . . .
. E . L . W . L . D .
. . L . . . O . . . .

Now, we read the letters row by row to get the encrypted message:

HOLEWLDLOR
